channel.title: When did Mopar actually start?
channel.description:
November 11, 2006, 03:11:37 PM
How close is it to that date? [hr]
[img]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/topic/normal_post_locked.gif[/img] Moderator Log: No discussion about this is needed. Though most of your answer has been answered and I guess the only person who can answer your question with an exact date is Moparisthebest (if he remembers ofc) or any other very early veterans so I suggest private messaging them. To see the answer refer to Newty's post [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,652999.msg4375532.html#msg4375532][u]here[/u][/url]

item.title: When did Mopar actually start?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I think it was a bit earlier then the first registered member though. There was an issue with the database right after the forum was started and stuff had to be reset afaik.

Also:

Davidi2:

However it’s worth mentioning nobody really cares how early you registered if you haven’t done anything in the community

Read full topic

item.title: When did Mopar actually start?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

First member registered 21st of February, 2006

Read full topic

item.title: When did Mopar actually start?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Im pretty sure it started in late January or early February of 2006, so that’s about 10 months off. However it’s worth mentioning nobody really cares how early you registered if you haven’t done anything in the community

Read full topic
